name: 芮祥鵬
objective:
本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：
(I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。
(II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形  等專題。
schedule:
1.Polymer Introduction (1)
2.Polymer Introduction (2)
3. Polymer Morphology (1)
4. Polymer Morphology (2)
5. Polymer Solution and solubility
6. Polymer Reacter Design
7. Mid term Exam
8. Polymer viscosity
9. Polymer Rheology (1)
10. Polymer Rheology (2)
11. Extrusion and Injection Molding
12. Blowing Film and Fiber Spinning
13. Coating and Printing
14. Polymer Blending and Compounding
15. Paper Review
16. Paper Review
17. Paper Review
18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Mid term 30 %

Final 40 %

Oral report and paper reviewing 30%
